Class GridFilters<M>

java.lang.Object

Type Parameters:
M - the model type
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentPlugin<Grid<M>>
public class GridFilters<M>
extends AbstractGridFilters<M>

Applies filters to the rows in a grid. For more information, see AbstractGridFilters.
